text: Volcano is a 1997 American disaster movie set in Los Angeles. Mick Jackson directed the movie. Jerome Armstrong and Billy Ray wrote the screenplay. Tommy Lee Jones, Anne Heche, and Don Cheadle star in the movie. In the movie, Jones is the head of the Los Angeles County Office of Emergency Management (LAC OEM). Jones's character tries to save Los Angeles from a lava flow coming from a newly formed volcano in the La Brea Tar Pits. == Related pages == * Dante's Peak â€“ another volcano-based movie released in 1997 == References == ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1997 movies Category:1990s disaster movies Category:1990s American disaster movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies about volcanoes Category:Movies about fires Category:Movies about firefighting Category:Movies composed by Alan Silvestri
title: Volcano (1997 movie)
